SEARCH
Package controller

Class PharmacistController

java.lang.Object
controller.SessionController
controller.PharmacistController
public class PharmacistController extends SessionController
Controls the operations related to pharmacists in the medical system. Manages medication inventory, prescription statuses, and appointment outcomes. Provides methods to submit replenishment requests and update prescription statuses.
Since:
2024-11-18
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lee Kuan Rong Shane, Lim Wee Keat, Tan Wen Rong, Yeoh Kai Wen

    • dispenseMedication

      private boolean dispenseMedication(Appointment appointment)
      Attempts to dispense medication for an appointment and returns success status.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment for which to dispense medication
      Returns:
      true if all medications were dispensed successfully, false otherwise
